content.question:
You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to respond. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Yumiko Tananka, a Japanese student, about working.

Press record to begin each response to the conversation.

Response 1
